statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProduct WHERE SupplierId = #SupplierId# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProduct WHERE SupplierId = #SupplierId# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProduct WHERE InsertTime < #InsertDate# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId# ORDER BY InsertTime DESC
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM SupplierProduct WHERE InsertTime > #InsertDate# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId# ORDER BY InsertTime ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SupplierProduct WHERE SupplierId = #SupplierId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SupplierProduct WHERE InsertTime < #InsertTime# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM SupplierProduct WHERE InsertTime > #InsertTime# AND SupplierId = #SupplierId#) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT TOP 1 SupplierProductPriceRange FROM SupplierProduct WHERE SupplierId = #SupplierId# AND ProductId = #ProductId#
